about_the_game:
・An additional color pack including 6 colors for the 4 additional characters of GGST Season 2 (total of 24 colors).

*Purchasing the main product is required to access this content. You will also need to have downloaded the latest updates.
*More information about this content can be found on the website.
*The colors for unreleased characters will be delivered at the same time as the character.
*You will need to have purchased the DLC characters to use the colors in this pack.
